items.sentence: Tom walked as fast as he could to catch up with Mary.
Tom wanted Mary to forgive John for what he had done.
Tom wanted a place in the country he could call home.
I thought that Tom said that Mary was from Australia.
I told Tom we were going to Australia for a few days.

We had a little trouble with the equipment yesterday.
I want to know how many times you\'ve been to Boston.
I was hoping the ice cream wouldn\'t melt so quickly.
Tom said he thought he heard voices in the next room.
Tom said he wanted to learn how to tie a square knot.
Tom said he was determined to find out what happened.
I\'ve been trained to deal with this kind of problem.
I\'ve been trying to get a little exercise every day.
I\'ve heard that Tom buys things on the black market.

I can hear traffic noise all night long where I live.
No, Mary isn\'t my stepsister, she\'s my half sister.
I\'m sure that she has arrived at the village by now.

I hope I\'m not the only one who thinks this is true.

I wish girls found me as attractive as they find Tom.

This is the best cup of coffee that I\'ve ever drunk.
